alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:56PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Christian, east central Caldwell and southwestern Hopkins Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 856 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olney, or near Princeton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dawson Springs around 905 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Nortonville and Crofton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 78 and 103. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 19 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
